email_support_query.subject: Hiver Not Loading - System Requirements Issue
email_support_query.body:
Hi Hiver Support Team,

I'm having trouble getting Hiver to work properly in my Gmail. The extension seems to install fine, but most of the features aren't showing up in my inbox.

Here's my current setup:
- Browser: Firefox 121.0
- Operating System: Windows 11
- Gmail View: Basic HTML (company policy)
- RAM: 16 GB
- Internet Speed: 50 Mbps
- Other Extensions: Boomerang for Gmail, Streak CRM

I really need this working for our team collaboration. Can you help me troubleshoot this issue?

Best regards,
Sarah Johnson
Project Manager
Acme Corporation

identified_issues.description: Using Firefox instead of Google Chrome
identified_issues.solution: Switch to Google Chrome latest stable version

identified_issues.description: Using Basic HTML view instead of Standard view
Boomerang and Streak may interfere with Hiver

steps: Install and use Google Chrome (latest stable version)
Switch Gmail from Basic HTML to Standard view
Test functionality in the new setup
recommended_solution.additional_notes: Since you're using this for team collaboration, ensure your IT team allows the Hiver Chrome extension and allowlists *.hiverhq.com, *.hiverapi.com, *.googleapis.com domains
